shows.title: OK Chorale
shows.desc: What better way to close the festival than to join together and raise your voices in song in the most heart-warming mass-e-oke gathering you'll ever experience. The OK Chorale is for everyone to enjoy – young, old, whether you can sing or not. With a house band of Greenbelters, led by Chris Read (of Harry & Chris) belting out a repertoire of irresistible classics from the pop pantheon, we introduced the OK Chorale last year and it stole the show. It's now a 'thing'. And we can't imagine finishing Greenbelt any other way. It will send you home with a smile and a sore throat. Like Beer and Hymns. But without the hymns.
